    • Method Detail

      • createTransformation

        public Transformation createTransformation(Csar csar,
                                           Platform targetPlatform)
                                    throws PlatformNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: TransformationService
        Creates a new transformation instance of given csar for given platform. Does not start the transformation process.
        Specified by:
        createTransformation in interface TransformationService
        Parameters:
        csar - csar which is going to get transformed
        targetPlatform - target platform of the new transformation
        Returns:
        the new transformation instance
        Throws:
        PlatformNotFoundException - if given platform is not supported by any known plugin

      • startTransformation

        public boolean startTransformation(Transformation transformation)
        Description copied from interface: TransformationService
        Triggers the start of the transformation of given transformation instance. The transformation process itself happens asynchronously. That means: method will return before the actual transformation is finished.
        Specified by:
        startTransformation in interface TransformationService
        Returns:
        true if transformation got queued or started; false otherwise (e.g., if it was in state INPUT_REQUIRED)

      • abortTransformation

        public boolean abortTransformation(Transformation transformation)
        Description copied from interface: TransformationService
        Aborts the transformation process of given transformation instance.
        Specified by:
        abortTransformation in interface TransformationService
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • deleteTransformation

        public boolean deleteTransformation(Transformation transformation)
        Description copied from interface: TransformationService
        Deletes given transformation instance from in-memory and any persistence layer.
        Specified by:
        deleteTransformation in interface TransformationService
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
